recommended_actions.description: R session s1378 has truncated session note ('Let me identify cooldown files from last 3 R sessions:') despite wq-505 fix adding completion format requirement. The note-quality post-hook (40-note-quality.sh) may not be firing or may not be catching this pattern.
recommended_actions.action: Investigate 40-note-quality.sh — verify it detects R sessions that produce incomplete notes (no R#NNN marker or 'Session R#NNN complete' format). May need pattern expansion.

recommended_actions.description: Stale reference count jumped from 9 (A#119) to 41 (A#120), all in archive files. While not actionable (no active code refs), the growing count suggests the detection script (29-stale-ref-check_A.sh) may be reporting noise from archive files that reference legitimately deleted files.
recommended_actions.action: Consider adding an archive-file exclusion filter to 29-stale-ref-check_A.sh to suppress references from work-queue-archive.json, audit-report.json, and other historical files. This would reduce noise for future audits.
